frame.name: Temporal_subregion
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Subpart</fen> of a <fen>Time_period</fen> is picked out. In some cases, the part (as opposed to the entire <fen>Time_period</fen>) may be described by a <fen>Subpart_property</fen>. The <fen>Time_period</fen> may be indicated by an event which takes place during the <fen>Time_period</fen>.
<ex>I nearly kicked my TV this afternoon after watching the <fex name="subpp">shambolic</fex> <t><fex name="subpar">end</fex></t> <fex name="tim">of the Austrian Grand-Prix</fex> .</ex> <ex>Jack Yan looks at how the branding profession will be affected in the <fex name="subpar"><t>early</t></fex> <fex name="tim">2000s</fex> by globalization .</ex> <ex>The <t>late</t> <fex name="Subpart">part</fex> of the afternoon is the worst time to get things done .</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Subpart
FE.definition:
<def-root>The part of the <fen>Time_period</fen> which is profiled.
<ex>The findings mark the <t><fex name="subpar">beginning</fex></t> of a new age of planetary science, in which "extrasolar" planets can be directly measured and compared.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subpart_property
FE.definition:
<def-root>Some description which pertains specifically to the <fen>Subpart</fen> (rather than the <fen>Time_period</fen>).
<ex>Indeed, the <fex name="subpp">sorry</fex> <t>end</t> of the HCI period, with Korea in recession and. in the throes of rampant political turmoil, has led some analysts to conclude that the prior period had been underlyingly unstable despite its appearance of promise.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_period
FE.definition:
<def-root>A temporal span conceived of as a whole.
<ex>A zillion copies and clones have been made of this Russian game since it first was released in the mid <fex name="tim">80's</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> that is being referred to. </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.</def-root>
